name: Broadcast, Unicast and Multicast Frame Delivery
title: BUM-FD
validEntryNotes: Valid entry of “C” indicates the Broadcast, Unicast and/or Multicast service frames that will be delivered if certain product descriptions and/or provider specific conditions are met.
Valid entry of “D” indicates the Broadcast, Unicast and/or Multicast service frames that will be discarded.
Valid entry of “U” indicates the Broadcast, Unicast and/or Multicast service frames that will be delivered unconditionally.
All positions are optional and an entry in one position does not require an entry in any other position.
usageNotes: Optional when the ACT field on the ASR Form is “N” or “C”, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: More information regarding this field can be found in the Metro Ethernet Forum (MEF)Technical Specification MEF 10.3.
